description.value:
You gain a new Eikonic Number which serves as your Eikonic Number of Order (see the “Eikonic Numbers” Cleric Starter Ability for details).

You also gain access to the following Mantras, which can only be assigned to your Eikonic Number of Order:

  • Justice Never Rests: You gain an extra Reaction until the start of your next turn.
  • Lawful: You immediately know either:
    • An important law, natural or legal, of the area you are in.
    • Someone who has broken the law in the last 24 hours within 1 mile of you.
  • Oath to Order: Move an event or creature’s turn up or back in the Turn Order by 1 slot. This can only affect the same target once per turn.
